title: Tata Power arm pledges Rs 75,000 cr to achieve 20GW solar capacity by 2030
description: Tata Power Renewable Energy Ltd (TPREL) plans to invest Rs 75,000 crore to reach 20GW of operational capacity by 2030. Currently, the company operates 5 GW and has another 5 GW under construction. TPREL recently commissioned a 4.3 GW module manufacturing facility in Tirunelveli to support its growth.
